trees.layout

Enum Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Action>
      • trees.layout.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Action>

    public enum Action
extends java.lang.Enum<Action>
    Helper class for notifying the actions which have been done on the tree in reaction of a change. There is a complete order in the sense of actions to be done.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      REALIGN
      Recalculating the alignments without changing the the displaying tree
      REBUILD
      Rebuilding the complete structure
      RECALCULATE
      Redoing the final positioning of the displaying tree
      REPAINT
      Repainting without changing the the displaying tree
      REPOSITION
      Redoing the full positioning of the displaying tree
